trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting> event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") within the control is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control deletes the record.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollere hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting>-hendelse når en Slett-knapp (en knapp med den `CommandName` egenskapen satt til "Delete") i kontrollen klikkes, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen sletter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as verifying a record before deleting it, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel en post før du sletter den, når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A FormViewDeleteEventArgs object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the record being deleted and to indicate that the delete operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: En FormViewDeleteEventArgs-objekt er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, som gjør det mulig å finne ut indeksen for oppføringen slettes og å angi at sletteoperasjonen bør avbrytes.

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of a record, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå indeksen for en oppføring i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the delete operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte sletteoperasjonen, angitt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also access the key fields and non-key fields by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også gå nøkkelfelt og ikke er en nøkkel felt ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: These values are useful if you want to verify the record before deleting it.
trans-unit.target: Disse verdiene er nyttig hvis du vil kontrollere oppføringen før du sletter den.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is possible to modify the key field values and non-key field values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Det er mulig å endre feltverdier og ikke-nøkkelfelt verdiene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you change these values, the record that corresponds to the new values will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du endrer disse verdiene, slettes posten som svarer til de nye verdiene.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the FormViewDeleteEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av klassen FormViewDeleteEventArgs, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdien for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>|The value of the `rowIndex` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>| Verdien for den `rowIndex` parameteren. | > [!NOTE] > Denne konstruktøren brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere ved å heve hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row being deleted.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden som skal slettes.

trans-unit.source: Gets an ordered dictionary of key field name/value pairs for the record to delete.
trans-unit.target: Henter en bestilte ordliste for nøkkelfeltet navn/verdi-par for posten slette.

trans-unit.source: The Keys property contains the values of the key fields listed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen nøkler som inneholder verdiene i nøkkelfeltene som er oppført i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the Keys property to access the values of the key field or fields for the record to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen nøkler for å få tilgang til verdiene for nøkkelfeltet eller felt for post som skal slettes.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to verify the record before deleting it, to change the record to delete, or to keep a log of deleted records.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke disse verdiene du kontrollerer oppføringen før du sletter det. Hvis du vil endre oppføringen slette eller loggføre slettede poster.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property contains only the key fields.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Inneholder bare nøkkelfeltene for denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: To access the name/value pair values for the non-key fields, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til navn/verdi-par verdier for feltene ikke er en nøkkel, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Keys property returns an <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer de nøkler en <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>objekt som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> objects that represent the key fields.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>objektet inneholder <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName>objekter som representerer nøkkelfeltene.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: To access the key field names, use the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A> property of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object.
trans-unit.target: For å få tilgang til nøkkelen feltnavnene, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>objektet.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can access the key field values by using the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte du har tilgang til nøkkelen feltverdiene ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object to access the key field values.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Som en snarvei du kan også bruke indeksering av den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>objekt for å få tilgang til nøkkelen feltverdiene.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The advantage in using the indexer is that it returns key field values directly.
trans-unit.target: Fordelen ved bruk av indeksering er at den returnerer feltverdier direkte.

trans-unit.source: Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>) can access key field values only by index.
trans-unit.target: Datakilde-kontroller som avhenger av feltrekkefølgen (eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>) kan bare tilgang til feltverdier ved indeks.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The Keys and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> properties are read-only; however, you can modify the field values of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object.
trans-unit.target: Nøklene og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A>er skrivebeskyttet, men du kan endre verdiene i den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>objektet.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you change the key and non-key field values, the corresponding record will be deleted from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du endrer nøkkel og ikke-nøkkelfelt verdier, slettes tilsvarende oppføringen fra datakilden.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary"></xref> that contains the key field name/value pairs for the record to delete.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary"> </xref> som inneholder nøkkelfelt navn/verdi-par for oppføringen til å slette.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the record being deleted from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksen for oppføringen slettes fra datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Use the RowIndex property to determine the index of the record being deleted from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Bruk RowIndex-egenskapen til å fastslå indeksen for oppføringen slettes fra datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The row index corresponds to the page index of the record being deleted.
trans-unit.target: Radindeksen tilsvarer siden indeksen oppføringen slettes.

trans-unit.source: The index of the record being deleted from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for oppføringen slettes fra datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary of the non-key field name/value pairs for the item to delete.
trans-unit.target: Henter en ordliste for ikke-nøkkelfelt navn/verdi-par for elementet skal slettes.

trans-unit.source: Use the Values property to access the values of the non-key fields for the record to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen verdier til å få tilgang til verdiene i feltene ikke er en nøkkel for oppføringen som skal slettes.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to verify the record before deleting it, or to keep a log of deleted records.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke disse verdiene du kontrollerer oppføringen før du sletter den, eller å loggføre slettede poster.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property does not contain the key field or fields.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Egenskapen inneholder ikke felt eller felt.

trans-unit.source: To access the name/value pair values for the key field or fields, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til navn/verdi-par verdiene for felt eller felt, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Values property returns an <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer verdiene en <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>objekt som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> objects that represent the non-key fields.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>objektet inneholder <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName>objekter som representerer feltene ikke er en nøkkel.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: To access the field names, use the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A> property of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object.
trans-unit.target: For å få tilgang til feltnavnene, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>objektet.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can access the field values by using the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte du har tilgang til feltverdiene ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object to access the field values.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Som en snarvei du kan også bruke indeksering av den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>objekt for å få tilgang til feltverdiene.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The advantage in using the indexer is that it returns field values directly.
trans-unit.target: Fordelen ved bruk av indeksering er at den returnerer feltverdier direkte.

trans-unit.source: Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>) can access field values only by index.
trans-unit.target: Datakilde-kontroller som avhenger av feltrekkefølgen (eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>) kan bare tilgang til feltverdier ved indeks.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The values in the Values collection do not get passed to the data source control.
trans-unit.target: Verdiene i verdisamlingen ikke få sendt til datakildekontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If the data source requires any of these values, you should add these values to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis datakilden krever noen av disse verdiene, må du legge til disse verdiene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A> and Values properties are read-only; however, you can modify the field values of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>og verdier er skrivebeskyttet, men du kan endre verdiene i den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>objektet.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you change the key and non-key field values, the corresponding record will be deleted from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du endrer nøkkel og ikke-nøkkelfelt verdier, slettes tilsvarende oppføringen fra datakilden.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary"></xref> that contains the non-key field name/value pairs for the item to delete.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary"> </xref> som inneholder ikke-nøkkelfelt navn/verdi-par for elementet skal slettes.
